None.Name: Tainted Void Shock
None.Description: Every 8 seconds, tower fires off a chargeable shot that deals 330 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 500 in total. The more void power has been accumulated the faster the tower will be able to shoot. If at least 150 own void power has been stored it will already shoot 25% faster gaining even more speed the more void power is available. Knocks back small and medium units.
